snippet: Lincoln needs more differentiation -- not to mention more luxurious models -- to justify its existence, but the MKZ concept is only a small first step in advancing that imperative.
abstract: Lincoln needs more differentiation -- not to mention more luxurious models -- to justify its existence, but the MKZ concept is only a small first step in advancing that imperative.
lead_paragraph: Introduced on Tuesday, Jan. 10: Lincoln MKZ Concept.

headline.main: MKZ Concept Is the Next Step in Lincoln's Reinvention
